graph.title: BBPS COU/BOU Transaction State Machine Graph
graph.description: Comprehensive BBPS transaction lifecycle state machine covering Bill Fetch, Payment, Status Inquiry, Refund/Reversal, Settlement, Reconciliation, and Complaint flows. Designed for COU/BOU systems with idempotency, audit, SLA monitoring, and operational recovery.

states.title: Transaction Created
states.description: Initial system state after transaction object is created. No bill fetch/payment executed yet.

states.title: Bill Fetch Initiated
states.description: Customer/agent initiates bill fetch request with consumer parameters.

states.title: Bill Fetch Request Sent
states.description: Bill fetch request sent to BBPS/biller endpoint.

states.title: Bill Fetch Success
states.description: Bill details successfully fetched and validated.

states.title: Bill Fetch Failed
states.description: Bill fetch failed due to invalid parameters, biller error, or BBPS rejection.

states.title: Bill Fetch Timeout
states.description: Bill fetch request timed out; bill status unknown.

states.title: Payment Initiated
states.description: Customer/agent initiates bill payment request. Idempotency key must be validated.

states.title: Payment Validated
states.description: Payment request validated internally: biller rules, amount rules, channel validation, wallet/bank validation, and fraud checks.

states.title: Payment Request Sent to BBPS
states.description: Payment request sent to BBPS gateway / NPCI rails / biller endpoint.

states.title: Payment Pending
states.description: Payment status is uncertain due to timeout or delayed confirmation. Must be resolved via status inquiry.

states.title: Payment Success
states.description: BBPS confirmed payment success. This is a terminal outcome for payment flow, but settlement/reconciliation continues.

states.title: Payment Failed
states.description: BBPS confirmed payment failure. No settlement occurs.

states.title: Payment Timeout
states.description: Payment request timed out before response from BBPS. Must transition into pending resolution workflow.

states.title: Status Inquiry Initiated
states.description: Status inquiry initiated for a pending or uncertain payment.

states.title: Status Inquiry Sent
states.description: Status inquiry request sent to BBPS for transaction confirmation.

states.title: Status Inquiry Success
states.description: Status inquiry returned a valid result (SUCCESS/FAILED/PENDING).

states.title: Status Inquiry Failed
states.description: Status inquiry failed due to BBPS error, invalid reference, or integration issue.

states.title: Settlement Pending
states.description: Payment success recorded; settlement confirmation pending from BBPS settlement cycle.

states.title: Settlement Confirmed
states.description: Settlement confirmation received and recorded.

states.title: Reconciliation Pending
states.description: Transaction is awaiting reconciliation with BBPS settlement files and internal ledger.

states.title: Reconciliation Matched
states.description: Transaction matched successfully with BBPS settlement and internal ledger records.

states.title: Reconciliation Mismatched
states.description: Transaction mismatch found between internal ledger and BBPS settlement file.

states.title: Reconciliation Resolved
states.description: Mismatch resolved manually or automatically with proper approvals and audit logs.

states.title: Refund Initiated
states.description: Refund process initiated for a successful payment.

states.title: Refund Pending
states.description: Refund request sent and awaiting confirmation.

states.title: Refund Success
states.description: Refund confirmed successfully.

states.title: Refund Failed
states.description: Refund failed due to BBPS rejection or bank failure.

states.title: Reversal Initiated
states.description: Reversal initiated within allowed time window to reverse a transaction before final settlement.

states.title: Reversal Pending
states.description: Reversal request pending confirmation.

states.title: Reversal Success
states.description: Reversal confirmed successfully.

states.title: Reversal Failed
states.description: Reversal failed due to rejection or already settled transaction.

states.title: Complaint Raised
states.description: Complaint raised for a transaction by customer or operations team.

states.title: Complaint In Progress
states.description: Complaint is being investigated; evidence gathering and resolution is in progress.

states.title: Complaint Escalated
states.description: Complaint escalated to higher support or BBPS dispute process.

states.title: Complaint Resolved
states.description: Complaint resolved with appropriate action taken (refund, reversal, clarification, or closure).

states.title: Complaint Closed
states.description: Complaint case closed after resolution confirmation and customer acknowledgement (if required).

transitions.title: Send Bill Fetch to BBPS
transitions.description: System sends bill fetch request to BBPS.

transitions.title: Bill Fetch Response Failed
transitions.description: BBPS returned failure or validation error.

transitions.title: Bill Fetch Timeout
transitions.description: Bill fetch timed out waiting for BBPS response.

transitions.title: Retry Bill Fetch
transitions.description: Retry bill fetch request after timeout.

transitions.title: Initiate Payment
transitions.description: Customer initiates payment after bill is fetched successfully.

transitions.title: Validate Payment
transitions.description: Validate payment request parameters, biller rules, fraud checks.

transitions.title: Send Payment to BBPS
transitions.description: System sends payment request to BBPS gateway.

transitions.title: Payment Timeout
transitions.description: No response from BBPS within timeout.

transitions.title: Mark Payment Pending
transitions.description: After timeout, transaction is marked pending and must be resolved via status inquiry.

transitions.title: Initiate Status Inquiry
transitions.description: System triggers status inquiry job for pending transaction.

transitions.title: Inquiry Failed
transitions.description: Inquiry failed; system may retry until SLA threshold.

transitions.title: Mark Settlement Pending
transitions.description: After payment success, settlement pending is created.

transitions.title: Start Refund
transitions.description: Refund initiated for a successful payment.

transitions.title: Start Reversal
transitions.description: Reversal initiated within allowed time window.

transitions.title: Raise Complaint
transitions.description: Customer raises complaint for successful payment.

transitions.title: Escalate Complaint
transitions.description: Complaint escalated to supervisor or BBPS dispute team.
